alert.note: Alert for Lower St. Mary; Upper St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:46PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Mary Parish through 415 PM CDT... At 345 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Franklin, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Jeanerette, Baldwin, Ellerslie, Sorrel, Cote Blanche Island, Glencoe, Charenton and Centerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lower St. Mary; Upper St. Mary
